text: Sky-Watcher is a company that makes telescopes and telescope items. They make reflectors, refractors and catadioptric telescopes. As for telescope items, they make barlows, diagonals, finder scopes, eyepieces, bino viewer. Alt-Az and Eq mounts. The telescopes of Sky-Watcher range in size from 2 inches to 20 inches. == Other websites == *https://skywatcher.com/ Category:Technology companies
title: Sky-Watcher
